## MemPool.compact() method

Traverses free list and attempts to recursively merge blocks occupying consecutive memory regions. Returns true if any blocks have been merged. Only called if `compact` option is enabled.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected compact(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
